channel.title: Symbiosis on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Symbiosis on funPlantGenes

item.title: GhWAK13
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A05G2392 Gene Symbol: GhWAK13 Gene Name: wall-associated kinase 13 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Wall-associated kinase GhWAK13 mediates arbuscular mycorrhizal symbiosis and Verticillium wilt resistance in cotton.

item.title: GmACP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18g244300 Gene Symbol: GmACP Gene Name: acyl carrier protein Genome: Wm82.

item.title: GmN70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmN70 Gene Name: Nitrate and chloride transporter Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmN70 and LjN70.

item.title: GmPAP33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma19g37860 Gene Symbol: GmPAP33 Gene Name: Purple acid phosphatase gene 33 Genome: Wm82.

item.title: GmPTF1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.19G143900 Gene Symbol: GmPTF1a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Molecular module GmPTF1a/b-GmNPLa regulates rhizobia infection and nodule formation in soybean.

item.title: GmPTF1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.03G143900 Gene Symbol: GmPTF1b Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Molecular module GmPTF1a/b-GmNPLa regulates rhizobia infection and nodule formation in soybean.

item.title: GmSWEET6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.04G198600 Gene Symbol: GmSWEET6 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmSWEET6, was functionally characterised in soybean, and its role in AM symbiosis was investigated via transgenic plants.

item.title: GmVamp721a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.07g223000 Gene Symbol: GmVamp721a Gene Name: vesicle-associated membrane protein 721a Genome: Wm82.

item.title: GmVTL1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.05G121600 Gene Symbol: GmVTL1a Gene Name: vacuolar iron transporter like 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmVTL1a is an iron transporter on the symbiosome membrane of soybean with an important role in nitrogen fixation.

item.title: MdGH3-12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD15G1290900 Gene Symbol: MdGH3-12 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdGH3-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD02G1180300 Gene Symbol: MdGH3-2 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MtAHL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr4g098450 Gene Symbol: MtAHL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Whereas mutation of NCR169 arrested bacteroid development at a late stage, the absence of MtAHL1 or MtAHL2 completely blocked bacteroid differentiation indicating that they also regulate other NCR genes required for the development of nitrogen-fixing nodules.

item.title: MtAHL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr7g080980 Gene Symbol: MtAHL2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Whereas mutation of NCR169 arrested bacteroid development at a late stage, the absence of MtAHL1 or MtAHL2 completely blocked bacteroid differentiation indicating that they also regulate other NCR genes required for the development of nitrogen-fixing nodules.

item.title: MtDMI2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr5g030920 Gene Symbol: MtDMI2 Gene Name: DOES NOT MAKE INFECTION 2 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The MtDMI2-MtPUB2 Negative Feedback Loop Plays a Role in Nodulation Homeostasis.

item.title: MtEFD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MtrunA17_Chr4g0002631;MT0064_00055 Gene Symbol: MtEFD Gene Name: Genome: Mt5.

item.title: MtEFD2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MtrunA17_Chr3g0137174 Gene Symbol: MtEFD2 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR REQUIRED FOR NODULE DIFFERENTIATION 2 Genome: Mt5.

item.title: MtERF1-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtERF1-1 Gene Name: B-3 Ethylene Response Factor Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The B-3 Ethylene Response Factor MtERF1-1 Mediates Resistance to a Subset of Root Pathogens in Medicago truncatula without Adversely Affecting Symbiosis with Rhizobia.

item.title: MtMIF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MTR_4g127360 Gene Symbol: MtMIF3 Gene Name: Macrophage migration inhibitory factor 3 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Macrophage migration inhibitory factor MtMIF3 prevents the premature aging of Medicago truncatula nodules.

item.title: MtMSBP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtMSBP1 Gene Name: steroid-binding protein 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Membrane steroid-binding protein 1 (MtMSBP1) induced by a diffusible fungal signal is critical for mycorrhization in Medicago truncatula Three of them were previously shown to be mycorrhiza induced at later stages of the symbiosis, while MtMSBP1, encoding a membrane-bound steroid-binding protein, is a novel mycorrhizal marker.

item.title: MtRopGEF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr8g030850 Gene Symbol: MtRopGEF2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Phosphorylation of MtRopGEF2 by LYK3 mediates MtROP activity to regulate rhizobial infection in Medicago truncatula.

item.title: MtSWEET1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr3g089125 Gene Symbol: MtSWEET1b Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter 1b Genome: M.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr3g063490 Gene Symbol: MtYSL7 Gene Name: Genome: M.

item.title: PAM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PAM1 Gene Name: penetration and arbuscule morphogenesis 1 Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: We have previously identified a mutant in Petunia hybrida, penetration and arbuscule morphogenesis 1 (PAM1), that is defective in the intracellular stages of AM development.

item.title: Rj4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.01g165800-D Gene Symbol: Rj4 Gene Name: Glycine soja thaumatin-like protein Genome: Species: Glycine soja Functional Descriptions: Rj4, a Gene Controlling Nodulation Specificity in Soybeans, Encodes a Thaumatin-Like Protein But Not the One Previously Reported.

item.title: SlGH3.4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g092820 Gene Symbol: SlGH3.4 Gene Name: Putative indole-3-acetic acid amido synthetase Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlPHR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc08g060920 Gene Symbol: SlPHR1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: We determine that SlSPX1 integrates Pi signaling and AM symbiosis by directly interacting with a set of arbuscule-induced SlPHR proteins (SlPHR1, SlPHR4, SlPHR10, SlPHR11, and SlPHR12).

item.title: SlPHR10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc10g078720 Gene Symbol: SlPHR10 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: We determine that SlSPX1 integrates Pi signaling and AM symbiosis by directly interacting with a set of arbuscule-induced SlPHR proteins (SlPHR1, SlPHR4, SlPHR10, SlPHR11, and SlPHR12).

item.title: SlPHR11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc10g080460 Gene Symbol: SlPHR11 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: We determine that SlSPX1 integrates Pi signaling and AM symbiosis by directly interacting with a set of arbuscule-induced SlPHR proteins (SlPHR1, SlPHR4, SlPHR10, SlPHR11, and SlPHR12).

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc10g083340 Gene Symbol: SlPHR12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: We determine that SlSPX1 integrates Pi signaling and AM symbiosis by directly interacting with a set of arbuscule-induced SlPHR proteins (SlPHR1, SlPHR4, SlPHR10, SlPHR11, and SlPHR12).

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g067160 Gene Symbol: SlPHR4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: We determine that SlSPX1 integrates Pi signaling and AM symbiosis by directly interacting with a set of arbuscule-induced SlPHR proteins (SlPHR1, SlPHR4, SlPHR10, SlPHR11, and SlPHR12).

item.title: SYMRK;OsSYMRK
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os07g38070 RAPdb gene ID: Os07g0568100 Gene Symbol: SYMRK OsSYMRK Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: ZjAHA7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zj.jz044537212 Gene Symbol: ZjAHA7 Gene Name: Genome: “Junzao” reference genome Species: Ziziphus jujuba Functional Description: AM symbiosis can specifically induce the expression of plasma membrane type H+-ATPase (ZjAHA7) and K+ transporter gene (ZjHAK2), which may lead to a stronger K+ absorption capacity with mycorrhizal jujube.

item.title: ZjHAK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zj.jz011205017 Gene Symbol: ZjHAK2 Gene Name: Genome: “Junzao” reference genome Species: Ziziphus jujuba Functional Description: AM symbiosis can specifically induce the expression of plasma membrane type H+-ATPase (ZjAHA7) and K+ transporter gene (ZjHAK2), which may lead to a stronger K+ absorption capacity with mycorrhizal jujube.
